"A.P.241/4/24/13:20": "Aru. And Ms. Kohri? This is an unusual combination, huh?"
"Big sis is talking to big bro, so I went for a walk and then Kohri..."
"Being able to read the mood is one of my strong points. You should never disturb a conversation between siblings, so we wandered around as outcasts."
"<%me> is currently out somewhere, so I guess that means I'm an outcast too."
"So let's get along with each other, fellow outcasts!"
"Oh, this is a good opportunity. I wanted to ask you something..."
"Ms. Xiera, what is your... no, what is everyone in ARKS' stance about our current situation?"
"What do you mean?"
"Let's see... Aru and Mother were both from the ARKS universe, and so were ARKS were still involved."
"However, you could say that ARKS has nothing to do with Ardem, and it's a problem that the planet should solve itself."
"In other words, Kohri wants to know if ARKS will help intervene in this."
"Yes."
"It's as Kohri says. If we try to interfere into the internal affairs of Earth, we simply wouldn't have enough ARKS. We have no reason to interfere, in fact."
"However... in this case, the issue is a result of Mother and the incidents that occurred after rescuing Aru."
"So there's no need to worry, Ms. Kohri. ARKS will offer their cooperation and support."
"I've already made the necessary calls. We even got authorization from Commander Ulc!"
"Was Kohri worried that <%me> and the others wouldn't help us?"
"Well... Kind of, I guess."
"There's no need to be worried. <%me> and Xiera are friends. Friends help each other when they need it, right?"
"If big sis, big bro, or Kohri were in trouble, I'm sure <%me> and the others would help!"
"Fufu, Aru's straightforward views are easy to get, and accurate."
"You understand, right, Ms. Kohri? Ms. Hitsugi, Mr. Enga, and you are all our friends."
"ARKS would never abandon a friend. Rest assured, you can count on us."
"Okay!"
"Besides, I'm personally interested in the technology of Earth. There's some things I wanted to ask about."
"For example, PSO2. That sort of technology to transfer to other universes should be possible with our technology too."
"PSO2? If that's all, I have it installed on this device right here."
"What?! M-May I borrow that device for a moment, Ms. Kohri?!"

"ほほうほうほう、なーるほど……
座標わかってるからこれをああしてー……
あー、やっぱりそうやってるのかー……"

"……いやー、やっぱり現物見られると
理屈が一気につかめるからいいですねー。"

"それじゃあこの見返りが
アークスの協力、ということで？"

"軽っ！
アークスの指揮権限軽すぎっ！"
"ふふっ、冗談です。"

"でもですね、コオリさんたちが
アークスの協力を仰ぐのは
その程度の軽さでいい、ってことですよ。"

"なんといっても、私たちは仲間ですから。
ねー、アルくん。"
"うん！"
"わわわわっ！\u3000なんですなんです！？"

"……ラスベガス近郊で
エーテルの異常値を計測！？"

"ううん、ラスベガスだけじゃない……！
地球全体のエーテル量が、変化してる！
まるで、地球全体を覆い尽くすように……"
"アルくん！？"

"……すごく、気持ち悪い。
無理矢理、何をしようとしてるの……？"

"早く、早くみんなを呼んで！
あれを止めないと……！"
